Traits: Immobile, Enclosed, Sentry

Special Rules: Has Preysense Sight (Ignore Penalties and +20 Perception in Darkness) and Targeter (Reduce Test Difficulty by 1 step). Controller Swaps Sentry mode with +10 Tech-Use, fail jams but loses no ammo.

Point Defence Mode: Functions as Permenant Overwatch with 90 Fire Arc.

Sentry Mode: Area of Infleunce up to half weapon range. Can Fire in any direction and rolls for initiative as if an NPC.
